member.name: T:Navigation.ChecksumNavigationShield
member.summary: Protects Urls from tampering by appending a checksum to the query string. This is a string generated from the other query string parameters so if one happens to change the checksum should no longer match

member.name: T:Navigation.NavigationShield
member.summary: Provides the base functionality for Url protection mechanisms e.g. to prevent tampering or to obfuscate query string parameters. Regardless of the mechanism the state query string parameter, c0, is always present

Identifies if the Url is being decoded as a result of a call to
member.returns: Unprotected set of query string parameters

member.name: M:Navigation.ChecksumNavigationShield.Encode(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uses all the to generate a checksum and returns this data together with this checksum
member.param: An unprotected set of key/value pairs prior to the formation of the querty string
Ignored parameter as encodes all navigation and history points
member.returns: All query string parameters passed in together with generated checksum

member.name: M:Navigation.ChecksumNavigationShield.Decode(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uses the to check the query string has not been tampered with
member.param: Data generated by the method
Ignored parameter as encodes all navigation and history points
member.returns: All query string parameters passed in minus the generated checksum
member.exception: Any key is null; or the checksum does not tally

member.summary: Gets or sets key used in the checksum generation routine, should be kept secret to prevent Url vulnerability

member.summary: Gets of sets length of the generated checksum, the default value is 8

member.name: T:Navigation.SessionCrumbTrailPersister
member.summary: Persists crumb trails, over a specified length, in on the Web server. Prevents the creation of unmanageably long Urls

member.name: M:Navigation.SessionCrumbTrailPersister.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the parameter to determine whether to retrieve the crumb trail from . If retrieved from session it will be null if it had been removed as a result of the being breached or if the session expired since the crumb trail was added
member.param: Key generated by the method
member.returns: Either the or the retrieved value from server side session; can be null if retrieved from session

member.name: M:Navigation.SessionCrumbTrailPersister.Save(System.String)
member.summary: If the is not over the it is returned. Otherwise the is stored in session using a short key, unique within a given session. Also expunges old items from session, if the is breached when a new item is added
member.param: The crumb trail to persist
member.returns: or short, generated key pointing at in session

member.name: P:Navigation.SessionCrumbTrailPersister.MaxLength
member.summary: Gets of sets the length above which any crumb will be stored on the Web server, the default value is 500

member.name: P:Navigation.SessionCrumbTrailPersister.HistorySize
member.summary: Gets of sets the maximum number of crumb trails that will be held at any one time on the Web server, the default value is 50
